description: This CSS file defines styles for a themed application, including variables for light and dark modes, component styles, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling for alignment and background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the App with flexible layout and background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for application links with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles between light and dark themes, including hover and active states.
